Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS (40 nm) |
| polym e r |
| P C 7^1 B M (8^0 nm) |
| p o l y [(9, 9-bis(3'-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)] (PFN) (5 nm) |
| Al (100 nm) |

| p o l y [(9, 9-bis(3'-dimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene)] (PFN) |
| Al (100 nm) |

The entities "here" and "thin layer of" do not refer to material names.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The photovoltaic properties of the resulting polymers were investigated with a conventional device structure of ITO / PEDOT : PSS ( 40 nm ) / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M ( 8^0 n m ) / p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] ( PFN ) ( 5 nm ) / Al ( 100 nm ) , here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer since it can improve the electron extraction.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| ITO (ITO / PEDOT : PSS) |
| PEDOT : PSS (ITO / PEDOT : PSS) |
| 40 nm (ITO / PEDOT : PSS) |
| polymer : PC 7^1 B M (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M) |
| 8^0 nm (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M) |
| p o l y [ ( 9 , 9 -b i s ( 3 ′ -( N , Ndimethylamino)propyl)-2,7-fluorene)-alt-2,7-(9,9-dioctylfluorene) ] (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M / PFN) |
| 5 nm (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M / PFN) |
| Al (100 nm) (ITO / PEDOT : PSS / polym e r : P C 7^1 B M / PFN / Al) |
| thin layer of PFN (here a thin layer of PFN was employed as the cathode interlayer) |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| 8^0 nm (thickness of polym e r : P C 7^1 B M layer) |
| 5 nm (thickness of PFN layer) |
| 100 nm (thickness of Al layer) |
| PFN (name of the cathode interlayer material) |
